image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the image. Use 2 or 3 for spatial images, and 4 for 4D images like time-series data.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The output image file resulting from the operations.

operations_and_inputs.description: Mathematical operations and inputs to be applied on the images.
